metadata.title: Platinum
metadata.description: Experience our Platinum Level 4 bed, featuring a powerful combination of high-pressure and low-pressure lamps for a deeper, darker, and longer-lasting tan—plus enjoy unlimited access to all Level 1, 2, 3, and 4 beds.

props.title: Platinum
props.description: Experience our Platinum Level 4 bed, featuring a powerful combination of high-pressure and low-pressure lamps for a deeper, darker, and longer-lasting

props.title: Unleash Your Glow with Platinum Tanning
props.content: Discover the ultimate tanning experience with our Platinum Level 4 bed at Ohana Sun Tanning. This advanced tanning solution combines the power of high-pressure and low-pressure lamps, delivering a deeper, darker, and longer-lasting tan that will leave you looking radiant. Our Platinum service provides unlimited access to all Level 1, 2, 3, and 4 beds, ensuring you can customize your tanning journey to suit your needs. Whether you’re preparing for a special occasion or simply want to maintain a sun-kissed glow year-round, our Platinum tanning option offers unmatched results. Step into luxury and let our state-of-the-art technology elevate your tanning experience to new heights. Join us today, and let your skin shine with confidence!

props.title: Benefits of Platinum

benefits.title: Enhanced Tanning Experience
benefits.description: Achieve a deeper, darker tan with our specialized Level 4 bed, utilizing both high-pressure and low-pressure lamps for optimal results.

benefits.title: Unlimited Access
benefits.description: Enjoy limitless use of all tanning beds across Levels 1, 2, 3, and 4, allowing you to customize your tanning regimen.

benefits.title: Long-Lasting Results
benefits.description: Experience a longer-lasting tan that maintains its vibrancy, helping you look your best for weeks.

benefits.title: Time Efficiency
benefits.description: Maximize your tanning sessions with a powerful combination of lamps that provide quicker results, making the most of your time.

props.description: Discover the many advantages of choosing Platinum at Ohana Sun Tanning

props.title: What Clients Say About Platinum
props.description: Hear from satisfied clients who've experienced our Platinum.

faqs.answer: The Platinum Level bed combines high-pressure and low-pressure lamps, providing a deeper and longer-lasting tan. This dual approach allows for more even coverage and enhanced results compared to standard tanning beds.
faqs.question: What are the benefits of using the Platinum Level tanning bed?

faqs.answer: Yes, the Platinum service is suitable for all tanning levels. However, if you are new to tanning, we recommend starting with shorter sessions to assess your skin's response.
faqs.question: Can I use the Platinum service if I'm new to tanning?

faqs.answer: You can use the Platinum Level tanning bed as often as you like, but we recommend limiting sessions to 2-3 times per week to avoid overexposure and ensure optimal results.
faqs.question: How often can I use the Platinum Level tanning bed?

faqs.answer: Session duration can vary based on skin type and desired results. Typically, 10-20 minutes is recommended for the Platinum Level bed, but consult with our staff for personalized guidance.
faqs.question: Is there a recommended duration for each tanning session?

faqs.answer: Individuals with very fair skin, a history of skin cancer, or those on certain medications may need to avoid tanning beds. Always consult with a dermatologist before starting any tanning regimen.
faqs.question: Are there any skin types that should avoid the Platinum tanning bed?

faqs.answer: With the Platinum Membership, you gain unlimited access to all Level 1, 2, 3, and 4 beds, allowing you to choose the best option for your tanning needs and experience the full range of our services.
faqs.question: What other benefits come with the Platinum Membership?

props.title: Frequently Asked Questions
props.description: Get answers to common questions about Platinum.

props.title: Ready To Book Platinum?
props.description: Schedule your platinum appointment today and experience the difference.

contactInfo.address: 3230 East Union Hills Drive, Suite 105, Phoenix, AZ, 85050
